name: Omensight

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Installing. This may take a while...

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: wine64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Omensight/Omensight.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing. This may take a while...
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
